sourcesContent:
<script>
import Cookies from 'js-cookie';
import axios from 'axios';
import EditTagModel from './EditTagModal.vue'; // Import your EditTagModel component
import CreateTagModal from './CreateTagModal.vue'; // Import your CreateTagModal component

export default {
  name: 'AppEtiquetas',
  data() {
    return {
      tags: [],
      showEditModal: false,
      tagToEdit: null,
      showCreateTagModal: false,
    };
  },
  computed: {
    hasUserIdCookie() {
      return !!Cookies.get('userId');
    },
    filteredTags() {
      return this.tags.filter(tag => tag.user_id === Cookies.get('userId'));
    },
  },
  methods: {
    goToPage() {
      window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
    },

    fetchTags() {
      axios.get('http://localhost:8080/api/v1/tags/all')
        .then(response => {
          this.tags = response.data;
        })
        .catch(error => {
          console.error('Error fetching tags:', error);
        });
    },
    confirmDeleteTag(tag) {
      axios
        .delete(`http://localhost:8080/api/v1/tags/${tag.id}`)
        .then(() => {
          // Remove the deleted tag from the local list
          const index = this.tags.indexOf(tag);
          if (index !== -1) {
            this.tags.splice(index, 1);
          }
        })
        .catch(error => {
          console.error('Error deleting tag:', error);
        });
    },
    editTag(tag) {
      this.tagToEdit = tag;
      this.showEditModal = true;
    },
    closeEditModal() {
      this.showEditModal = false;
      this.tagToEdit = null;
    },
    updateTag(updatedTag) {
      // Implement your logic for updating the tag here
      console.log('Updated tag:', updatedTag);
    },
    showCreateTagModal() {
      showCreateTagModal = true;
    },
    closeCreateTagModal() {
      this.showCreateTagModal = false;
    },
    createTag(newTag) {
      // Implement your logic for creating a new tag here
      console.log('Created tag:', newTag);
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    if (this.hasUserIdCookie) {
      this.fetchTags();
    }
  },
  components: {
    EditTagModel,
    CreateTagModal,
  },
};
</script>



<style>
.box {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  flex-direction: column;
  backdrop-filter: blur(30px);
  background-color: rgba(248, 248, 248, 0.135);
  border-radius: 5vh;
  width: 95%;
  padding-top: 1vh;
  padding-bottom: 3vh;
}

.container {
  height: 59vh;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  padding-bottom: 12vh;
}

.tag-list {
  color: white;
}

.buttons:hover {
  background-color: #393939;
}

.buttons.jump {
  animation: jumpAnimation 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

@keyframes jumpAnimation {
  0% {
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
  50% {
    transform: translateY(-5px);
  }
  100% {
    transform: translateY(0);
  }
}

.buttons {
  padding-top: 1vh;
  padding-bottom: 1vh;
  background-color: #63636395;
  border-radius: 3vh;
  width: 3%;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  color: #e4e2e2;
  border-color: #68686800;
  font-size: 25px;
  transition: background-color 0.3s;
  cursor: pointer;
}

h1 {
  color: #e4e2e2;
  font-size: 6vh;
}

p {
  color: #e4e2e2;
  font-size: 4vh;
}
</style>
